ygData.subject: Re: Obsessive compulsive behavior begins.
ygData.msgSnippet: Ice:: She smiled at FoxFinger. Pleased to meet you. She couldn t help but chuckle quietly at his thoughts.  She send him a message as he ran off. I ll help

Ice::

She smiled at FoxFinger. "Pleased to meet you." She couldn't help but 
chuckle quietly at his thoughts.  She send him a message as he ran 
off. "I'll help you out with that lock anytime you need it."

She turned, to Lunarpine. She thought to him,"I missed you too. Don't 
be afraid. I made it this far. Besides, I wasn't going to leave you. 
Not after all that you had done for me." She smiled at him and walked 
over.  She hugged him tight in her arms. "I really missed you."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Lunarpine kept a straight face as Ice sent her message to him. He 
> looked her in the eyes, "With our reputation in combat I'm sure 
we'll 
> be saving each others hides more often.
> 
> Foxfingers shook her hand. "It's a pleasure." he said, still in a 
bit 
> of a shock from being moved. His thoughts were as quick as his 
escape 
> routs as one thought told him "Leave me alone wench" and then "I 
love 
> a dominant creature." 
> 
> Foxfingers quickly sidestepped her making an excuse as he 
> did. "Excuse me Ice, I must go um, help Veratis with the DNA." He 
> scampered off toward the lab thinking "Who's that mutant beast 
think 
> she is picking me up like that. Although I'll be sure she's around 
> next time I need a lockpick."
> 
> Lunarpine transformed to bot mode and stepped forward. "Good to 
have 
> you back." His thoughts told his true feelings "I've missed you, I 
> was afraid for what I'd gotten you into."
